bug.author: parano
bug.summary: API server show blank index page
bug.description:
This is an issue introduced in 0.8.4, first reported in the #bentoml-users slack channel: Bo Han: hi there! new user here, bento-ml looks really cool, esp how it compartmentalizes ml deployment Going through the get-started guides. i noticed that the latest release 0.8.4 is causing swagger-ui to 404 on default (0.8.3 doesn't have this issue, maybe something related to custom-ui) steps to reproduce: follow get started guide to bentoml serve IrisClassifier:latest open <denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:5000/>http://127.0.0.1:5000/</denchmark-link>
issue: blank page, w/ errors for missing swagger-ui <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/489344/89825396-62fa9780-db09-11ea-94ec-e5189141814b.png></denchmark-link>
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Korusuke>@Korusuke</denchmark-link> for submitting the fix: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/pull/975>#975</denchmark-link>
We are planning to release a new version including this fix very soon.
